_header: Of all thing that ever was I am the beginner
Subjects: mystery plays; Abraham and Isaac, story of
_description: The Dublin Play of Abraham and Isaac — 369 lines in cross-rhymed quatrains

TCD432.First Lines:
Of all þing þer euer was I am þe begynnereHope
                    hevenly & erthly & of he þat ben in hell…
TCD432.Last Lines:
…What god comaundeþ say not nayfor ye shal not lese
                    þer by…
